fields.Title of Contribution: “Estimating Degradation Model Parameters from Character Images”
fields.Name of Conference: International Conference on Document Analysis and Recognition (ICDAR 2003)
fields.Description/Abstract:
This paper discusses the use of character images to
determine the parameters of an image degradation model.
The acute angles in character images provide information
used to find the model parameters. Three experiments are
conducted to evaluate the use of characters. In the first
experiment, large quantities of corners from character
images are used to investigate how their contribution
affects the mean and the standard deviation of the parameter
estimators. In the second experiment, we focus on the
relationship between the angles of the corners used in estimation
and the estimation results. In the last experiment,
we examine how likely the text in a common page would
offer a reasonable estimation result compared to the
results from experiments 1 and 2.
